title: The interpretation of seeing a ship flying in a dream heralds relief for the interested party

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a flying ship in a dream? Evidence of the closeness of the dreamer, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing yourself riding a flying ship in a dream? Evidence of the dreamer achieving all his desires and goals. Do you see a sick person riding a ship in a dream? Rapid recovery from diseases and improvement of his health condition. Interpretation of seeing the sail of a ship in a dream? A sign of freedom from worries and sorrows. What is the interpretation of seeing a ship sinking in a dream? He committed a lot of transgressions and sins and talked about people’s symptoms. What is the meaning of seeing a ship captain in a dream? A sign of achieving high ambitions and far-reaching goals. Do you dream of a single woman getting repairs? A ship? Good news for her to stay away from sins and transgressions. Interpretation of seeing a repair ship in a pregnant woman’s dream? Her birth will be peaceful and she will give birth to a healthy child. Interpretation of seeing a ship flying in a dream. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a ship flying in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s proximity, and God knows best. If The dreamer sees in his dream a ship with many people flying on it, then this is a sign of travel. As for the dreamer who sees this ship flying in the sky, it is a sign of abundance and prosperity. Whoever dreams of riding a flying ship in a dream indicates that the dreamer will achieve all his desires and goals. When the dreamer sees a large ship flying in His dream, it means that he will get a lot of profits and money. Interpretation of seeing a ship in a dream If the dreamer sees that he is riding a ship in his dream, this is a sign of his closeness to God Almighty and walking on the path of truth. When an unmarried young man sees in his dream that he is boarding a ship, this is a sign However, he will get married soon, God willing. But if a dreamer sees that he is boarding a flying ship, his dream contains news of his escaping calamities and problems. Seeing a sick person boarding a ship in a dream is evidence of his speedy recovery from illness and the improvement of his health condition. While the vision of boarding a ship in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes To open a new source of livelihood for her and make her feel joy and pleasure. The meaning of seeing a ship’s sail in a dream Seeing a ship’s sail in a dream means getting rid of worries and sorrows that affect the mental state of the pioneer. When he sees a man of cloth in a dream, it is a sign of relief from distress and distress and enjoying a happy and joyful life. Whoever sees the sail of a ship in his dream is evidence of the novelist’s ability to lead at work or at home. While seeing the sail of a ship in the dream of an unmarried girl symbolizes her close marriage with a good and righteous man. If the dreamer sees the sail of a ship in his dream, this means that there is Certain elements will help him reach the truth. Seeing a ship in a dream for a single woman Interpretation scholars said that an unmarried girl who sees a ship in her dream is evidence of her Lord’s great reward for her. When you see a ship sinking in a dream, this is a sign that you are committing a lot of disobedience and sins and are talking about Symptoms of people. But if he sees what he is driving a ship in a dream, it indicates her strong faith in God, her piety, and her righteousness. While seeing a ship captain in a dream is a virgin girl, it symbolizes that she will soon marry a young man who holds a special position. If a virgin girl dreams that she is driving a small boat,

title: Interpretation of seeing someone drinking alcohol in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq and interpretation of seeing someone drinking alcohol in a dream and refusing to drink alcohol in a dream

preview.html: Seeing yourself drinking alcohol in a dream - perhaps the dreamer looks at it with a frightening look because it is in fact prohibited by the Lord of the Worlds because of the harm it causes and which destroys the mind, but we find that its meaning can be completely different in the dream in some places, so scholars and interpreters have come together to clarify all the meanings. The dream during the article. Seeing yourself drinking alcohol in a dream. What is the interpretation of drinking alcohol in a dream? The dream indicates the abundance of goodness in the dreamer’s life if the dreamer was a good person in his life and was not affected by the person he ate in the dream. But if he became intoxicated in drinking, then he must correct his actions and avoid Taboos in his life. We find that dreaming this dream can lead to mistakes and sins in the dreamer’s life that he wants to get rid of in order to please his Lord and live in comfort and contentment, and here the dreamer must take the right path without a doubt. His life is free of crises and complications. If the dreamer runs some small projects, then he should know that they will bring him large sums of money later, and he will see the fruits of his efforts growing before him. Seeing this dream is an explanation of the existence of sins that we must repent of immediately, so it is necessary to Praying, supplicating, and reading the Qur’an to get out of adversity and live in peace and stability. Buying it in a dream has pleasant meanings for the dreamer, as happiness is permanent, but selling it leads to useless work that does not benefit him, and he must repair it immediately. What is the interpretation of drinking alcohol in a dream of Imam Al-Sadiq? Imam Al-Sadiq believes that Seeing alcohol leads to earning money through forbidden means, and this is one of the worst things that must be changed immediately. The dream also indicates repeated mistakes in the dreamer’s life, and if he continues with them, he will not find good in his life. Seeing this dream requires the dreamer to repent for all his sins. He should not do any forbidden work, no matter how tempting, until he achieves satisfaction and happiness in this world and the hereafter. Reaching the stage of drunkenness in a dream indicates the multiple mistakes and sins that the dreamer indulges in, but if he sincerely repents for them, he will achieve great comfort in his life. What is the interpretation of a vision of drinking alcohol? In a dream by Ibn Sirin? Imam Ibn Sirin sees that the dream is promising if the dreamer does not get drunk, it leads to very happy and cheerful concepts, but it leads to anxiety if it leads to drunkenness in the dream, but we also find that a lack of drunkenness can lead to forbidden money if The dreamer's morals are really bad. Buying alcohol in a dream expresses the dreamer's good morals and the abundance of his good deeds that make him psychologically and physically comfortable throughout his life. As for selling it, it does not indicate goodness, but rather indicates the shameful behavior of the dreamer who does not please God Almighty. Also, selling it It indicates that the dreamer is close to some haters without his knowledge, and here the vision is an important warning of the need to stay away from them permanently and commit to reading supplications daily, until this envy and anguish disappear. Enter the Egyptian dream interpretation website from Google, and you will find all the dream interpretations you are looking for. Seeing a single woman drinking wine in a dream. Seeing this dream means that good news will come to her soon.

title: Interpretation of seeing illness in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Illness in a dream is considered one of the most disturbing visions that a dreamer can see, whether he is the patient or one of his relatives and those who deal with them. The reason for this is that the patient suffers from pain and weakness, and it also puts the owner in a state of depression and anxiety, especially since diseases range from serious to easy to treat and recover. Some of them are dangerous and can lead to death, God forbid. The interpretation of a dream about illness has received the attention of scholars and dream interpreters because it is a complex and diverse dream that requires interpretation according to its circumstances. Interpretation of seeing illness in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing illness in a dream indicates health and strength if he sees it. A person has a minor illness on his skin, but if he sees that there is a sick person leaving the house and remaining silent without speaking, this indicates that. This person will die soon, but if he sees that he is talking and talking with others, this indicates a speedy recovery. However, if he sees that the patient is suffering from a serious illness and is suffering from a financial crisis, then this indicates salvation from him and relief from the worries and problems that he suffers from. However, if he sees that he He died as a result of this disease, then this indicates the great happiness that awaits this person. However, if a person sees that he is sick with measles, this indicates a lot of sustenance and abundant money that he will gain. However, if he hears in a dream that one of his relatives is afflicted with measles, this indicates that he will hear good news. If a person dreams that he died as a result of drowning, then this indicates salvation, healing, and salvation from loss. The meaning of the symbol of illness in a dream. In the following points, we present to you what the great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin mentioned about seeing illness in a dream: Ibn Sirin interpreted illness in a dream in more than one way, as It can refer to a disease of the hearts that often afflicts people, which protects the servant from his Creator, and makes him engage in worldly pleasures and good manners. Seeing diseases can indicate physical problems and physical exhaustion that prevent one from carrying out normal life activities. When a disease causes It appears in a dream in the feeling of coldness in the body, as it is a symbol of a deficiency in the rights of God Almighty and the acts of worship and obedience that must be performed. Whereas an illness that causes the viewer to feel an increase in temperature and heat in his body is an indication of the worries and problems that the viewer suffers from in the world. As a result of what the employer is exposed to. Or the ruler in his city. Recovering from an illness in a dream indicates the end of a stage in the dreamer’s life and the beginning of a new stage, whether it is related to the health, social, or economic aspect. A wealthy person, when he dreams that he is sick, is a sign of his suffering from loneliness despite all his money. Interpretation Seeing my son sick in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin says about seeing a sick child in a dream, whether he is the dreamer’s son, a relative, or a stranger to him, with the following interpretations: Seeing a sick young son in a dream means that the dreamer will afflict him with an illness or something he is already suffering from, but he will recover from it. Quickly. This vision shows the deterioration of the pioneer’s health and psychological condition and the worries and psychological problems that arise

title: Interpretation of seeing a mosque in a dream - Seeing a mosque in a dream

preview.html: Contents: The meaning of a dream about a mosque for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a married or unmarried man. Either he enters the mosque and prays, or he demolishes it, cleans it, and sweeps it. And converting the house into a mosque, and others by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-SadiqInterpretation: The mosque in a dream denotes the king who deals with religious affairs, the master who separates the state from the deprived, and the market in which people aim at profit, and every person emerges from it with a profit according to fate. His work and work. It refers to every obedient, teacher, kind and knowledgeable father. Declare justice for those who entered unjustly. It is abundantly indicated in the Holy Qur’an. It refers to the cemetery, which is a place of reverence, ablution, perfume, silence, and facing the Qiblah. It refers to what is used against enemies, such as a fortified fortress for safety from fear. Bishop of the King’s Mosque property and those familiar with its conditions. Mayors are heads of state and princes. His imprisonment extended his justice and the scholars who were under his authority. And its doors are covered. Seeing a mosque or mosque in a dream full means justice and goodness, and God Almighty mentioned that the destruction of the mosque in a dream indicates the death of a person known for religion. Building a mosque in a dream is an indication of kinship and uniting people in goodness, and also to victory over enemies, given that the imam of the mosque Different from it in reality, the dream may indicate the death of the Imam. From the deceased: A dream that turns your house into a mosque honors him and calls people to the truth. Whoever digs a hole in the mosque in a dream will get married. Whoever sees that it is covering a mosque, he will provide for orphans. The permissibility of abandoned mosques indicates the negligence of scholars and the abrogation of enjoining good and forbidding evil. Whoever sees that he entered the mosque and prostrated, then he will make the fold clear. Whoever sees that he died in the mosque: victory over the enemies. The Sacred Mosque is safe from fear, and the promise is real: seeing the mosque’s mats being cut or an accident occurring, and the dream indicates a calamity in the family, and its minaret is his deputy or someone with experience. And if he refers to the ruler, then the pillars of his time and his lamps are the lights of his time and the jurist, and he limits him in the extension of his decisions or what knowledge gives them, and his ceiling is for him. The books that he hides and refers to, and his minaret is the one that brings people together for whatever virtue it bestows on them. His pulpit is the servant, his mihrab is his wife or what the legal livelihood indicates, the minaret is a minister and an imam, and the minaret may refer to his muezzins, the Qur’an to the reciter, and the pulpit to his fiancée. The door is in its door and the guard is in its lamps and furniture. As for the mosque that the kings of Islam used during their travels and held for Eid prayers and other things, it indicates the establishment of the religion, the sublime speech of the Muslims, and the victory over their enemies, and its interpretive decision is the same as the open corridors they established through which the castles pass. The city’s mosque announces its people, its presidents, its leaders, its generals, its nobles, its people of memory, its godfather, the imam of the people, its pulpit its sultan or preacher, its lamps its people’s knowledge, kindness, jihad, and guarding in Rabat. As for its muezzin, he is the judge or scholar of the city. He calls people to guidance, follows in his guidance, his orders are carried out, and his cause is secure. As for its gatekeeper, he is a man. Workers, administrators, and police officers. T

title: Interpretation of a dream about black teeth

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about black teeth in a dream. Interpretations of the dream contain many things that tell the dreamer a number of things that will happen to him in the future. They can also warn him of the actions he takes and the search for his interpretation of the dream. Black teeth in a dream shows a group of interpretations, such as paying in court and other types of interpretations, and in this article we will provide you with information about the interpretation of a dream about black teeth, what is the interpretation of seeing teeth in a dream for individuals, what is the interpretation of seeing teeth in a dream, and what is the interpretation of a dream about teeth Dirty. What is the interpretation of a dream about black teeth? The interpretation of a dream about black teeth is one of the things that does not indicate goodness. If there are black teeth in the vision, this indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to a group of problems in the coming period of his life, and these problems often surround the family or in Work, and if black teeth are broken in a dream, this indicates the mood of all problems in the fortuneteller’s life, and if the dreamer is married, this indicates that he will live a happy life without difficulties, God willing. What is the interpretation of seeing teeth in a dream for a single woman? The interpretation of seeing teeth in a dream explains For an unmarried woman The situation in which an unmarried woman and if she sees that her teeth are falling out, it means that she wants to be very attached to someone, but this person wants it. Stay away from her, and it also indicates that many years have passed and this visionary feels a loss of love and tenderness, and if she sees her teeth in her hands, then she will marry a man who has an excellent position in society, and this man will work to achieve all the desires, goals and aspirations that the owner of the vision wants to achieve. What is the interpretation of a vision? Teeth in a dream? It came from the Moroccan dream interpreter Gustave that seeing teeth in a dream indicates illness or hatred in one’s life. The vision and the place of the dreamer in that vision. What is the interpretation of the dream of dirty teeth? He pointed out the interpretation of the dream of dirty teeth as convincing evidence of things that are not good and favorable for the dreamer, and that this dream could be evidence of sin and a great feeling of guilt that the dreamer will commit in the coming period. It could be any indication of a severing of the connection between the womb and the relationship between him and his family. Also, seeing rotting teeth in a dream indicates the bad psychological state that the viewer is experiencing at the present time, which negatively affects aspects of her life. It is known that there are many dreams that a person experiences in his life that warn him of the bad actions that he performs. Interpretation of dreams about dirty teeth .

Also, seeing rotting teeth in a dream indicates the bad psychological state that the viewer is experiencing at the present time, which negatively affects aspects of her life. It is known that there are many dreams that a person experiences in his life that warn him of the bad actions that he performs. Interpretation of dreams about dirty teeth .

title: Interpretation of seeing yourself cleaning fish in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing yourself cleaning fish in a dream: Fish is a meat rich in protein and calcium, which is necessary for building the body. It also increases fertility, and seeing it in a dream means goodness, abundance and success. Interpretation of the vision of cleaning the name: Whether the vision is for a single, married, pregnant or divorced woman, we will present it today from During the vision website, we will discuss the interpretation of the vision of cleaning fish in detail in a dream, based on the opinion of the great interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, al-Nabulsi, Imam al-Sadiq or modern-day interpreters. Follow us on the vision website. Interpretation of the vision of cleaning fish by Ibn Sirin. Seeing tender fish in a dream indicates money. Or spoils or inheritance. Seeing a small fish expresses distress and sadness. Seeing fishing in a man’s dream indicates the number of fish he will marry. If he catches two fish, he will marry two women, and if he catches three, he will marry three women. If he finds a pearl in the belly of the fish, it indicates childbirth. For a child.Interpretation of seeing a man cleaning fish in a dream. Seeing fishing in a young man’s dream indicates an abundance of sustenance and a large amount of money obtained from a job or a trip. Seeing a big fish in a man’s dream indicates a lot of living from a job or a profitable investment plan that brings a lot of money. Seeing a man buying fish in a dream for his wife indicates prosperity and financial and family stability. Interpretation of a dream about cleaning fish for a single woman. Seeing a lot of fish in the kitchen in a girl’s dream indicates the great hopes that she plans for the future and the speed of achieving them. Watching the fish being cooked and fried indicates achieving goals and good luck to you. Seeing yourself buying fish from the store or from the fish market in a girl’s dream portends success and success in her life and marriage to a wealthy young man. Interpretation of a dream about cleaning fish for a married woman. Seeing cleaning fish in a dream for a married woman shows the end of worry and anxiety and a clean diet. It can indicate stored money if the fish is in large quantities or stored in the refrigerator. Seeing cooking fish in a dream for a married woman indicates family stability and consideration for the affairs of the home and her children. If a married woman sees herself buying a large amount of fish from the market, it indicates prosperity and prosperity that will fill her. Her home, the death of worry and anxiety, and the settlement of debts. Interpretation of a dream about cleaning fish for a pregnant woman. A dream about a pregnant woman eating fish indicates happiness, contentment, and abundant living. If a pregnant woman sees that she is cleaning fish and removing thorns, this indicates an easy birth, as it may be natural, an abundant diet, and a lot of money. See buy Fish in a pregnant woman’s dream can indicate the death of pain and sadness and the beginning of a new life, as well as her happiness with the new baby. Interpretation of a dream about cleaning fish for a divorced woman and a widow. Seeing cleaning and cutting fish in a divorced or widowed woman’s dream indicates a lot of goodness in her life and the presence of honorable people in her life who support her. The vision A divorced woman and a widow eating fish in a dream. It indicates rest after fatigue, financial stability, and may indicate a new marriage

title: Eating grilled fish in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: But we will talk from our website by explaining the vision of grilled fish in a dream specifically for each person and according to the situation. Interpretation of the vision of eating grilled fish in a dream for one girl. When a single girl sees that she is grilling fish in a dream, this may mean that she is entering a state of emotional stability. While she sees a lot of grilled fish In the dream of an unmarried girl, this indicates the presence of many lovers in her life. It is said in a dream of grilled fish, catfish in the dream of an unmarried girl. Her performance indicates the love of many travelers for her in reality. What if an unmarried girl sees that she is grilling fish With many people in a dream. It means news, happiness, and success in her life, God willing. As for seeing eating grilled fish in an unmarried girl’s dream, it means success at work and excellence in all fields. Perhaps some great dream interpreters believe that seeing eating grilled fish means Her wedding date is approaching in the event that she is engaged or engaged soon, God willing. See also: Interpretation of fishing in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of watching her eat grilled fish in a dream for a married woman. Seeing grilled fish in a married woman’s dream. A sign of the coming of many good things, God willing. With regard to all grilled fish. In a married woman’s dream. It could mean the end of marital problems and the beginning of a new state of love in her life with her husband, with the help of God Almighty. Many contemporary dream interpreters have seen that the dream of eating grilled fish in a married woman’s dream. An indication of when she will approach pregnancy, if she is waiting for something like This situation. While dreaming of eating grilled fish with family members in a married woman’s dream. It indicates the marriage of a family member and a reunion can be achieved due to this circumstance. And seeing grilled fish eating a lot in a married woman’s dream. This means a lot of money that will come to her in the future. Soon, God willing. One of the interpreters of the vision can say that the dream of eating grilled fish with the husband is the dream of a married woman. It is an indication of the understanding and love that exists in the family between them. Interpretation of the vision of eating fish in a dream about the man and its meaning: Seeing a married man eating grilled fish in a dream. It can be It can be said that the interpretation of this vision has a lot to do with the means of livelihood that will come to him soon. But if he sees in the dream that he is eating a large amount of grilled fish, he will obtain a lot of food and money in his life, God willing. The interpretation of the vision of eating a large grilled fish in a married man’s dream is A lot of money for him and all his family members. It was mentioned in one of the dream interpretation books that seeing a young man eating grilled fish in a married man’s dream. It means money and not a lot, that is, it falls according to the size of the fish in the dream. Some commentators may differ in their opinion about eating fish Grilled, but through our article we have provided you with hope and accuracy. Like seeing a lot of grilled fish and sharing it with people in a dream. Its interpretation will be good news and less good, God willing. And eating different grilled fish in a married man’s dream. It means money or inheritance that will change Live form

title: Interpretation of the eye in a dream Seeing the eye in a dream

preview.html: The dream of eyes indicates religiosity and commitment to Islam and other interpretations, and we will interpret it for the single, the married, the pregnant, the divorced, the married and the single as black, green, blue and red. Brown and hazel eyes, I see eye disease and the injured eye of another person, or I take out my eyes or look at me here a person according to Ibn Sirin and others in continuation of the topic: Interpretation of the eye in a dream Seeing eyes in a dream and interpreting it religion, whoever sees that he is blind or his eyes collapsed, he has left Islam by committing a sin. Whoever sees that his eyes are white, this indicates his sadness, and if they fade, he will meet an absent person whose absence has been long or with someone he loves. And whoever sees that he was blind, then he sees, he will lead to the truth If a person sees that he is leading the blind, he will lead the lost to the truth Whoever sees that he is one-eyed, half of his religion is gone, and he committed a great sin, it was said that he benefits from his brother and hopes for his growth, and perhaps he gets rid of distress and disobedience. It was said: If he had a brother or a son who died, perhaps half of his money was gone or half of his life went to spend what remained, and it was said that he would be among the people. From heaven and some of them said I hate it in a dream because Satan is one-eyed and so was the Antichrist. Whoever sees that he was injured in his eyes and he is left and just and has no son or brother, then he will be affected in his money by the eye, and it is said: It was shown to him. Whoever sees ashes in his eye, then corruption will occur in his religion, and he will see the destruction of his religion. As for whoever sees that his eyesight is reduced in his sight, apparent or hidden, this is an increase in his religion as it appeared. And whoever sees that he is treating his eyes, he has five of righteousness in his religion, an increase in his money, comfort of the eye, and the arrival of a brother from the march of the existence of the state. Whoever sees that he wears kohl for decoration, then what results in decoration and righteousness comes out of it, and it is said: If he was single, he would marry or poor, he would benefit from good money. It was said that whoever saw him wearing an obscene collar was collecting two wives. And whoever saw that he had placed the colon in an inappropriate way, he asks for something forbidden from the vagina or the anus. Whoever saw that there were many eyes in his body, this is an increase in religion. Likewise, whoever saw that he was eating with his eye, then eating with his money, whoever saw his livelihood with his eye is a criminal. Whoever saw that he had an eye or two eyes in his hand, whether they were human eyes or others, he has money in any case. Whoever saw an eye in his heart, it is justice in his religion and his wisdom that speaks and comes out of his heart. Interpretation of a dream about seeing with an eye by Al-Nabulsi: In a dream, a person’s religion and his insight through which he sees guidance and misguidance. Whoever saw many eyes in his body, this is an increase in religion and righteousness. Whoever saw that he saw an evil man, then he conspired against him, and hated him, if he saw that his eyes were made of iron, he would tear his jacket and be very upset. And if he saw on his shoulder the eye of a man or the eye of an animal: he has unseen money, and the black eye is a debt, and the white eye is a violation of religion, and the blue eye is a religion of innovation. The green eye is a religion that contradicts religions. If he sees that his eyes have disappeared, his children will die, and if he is oppressed, he will find someone to hold his hand, and if he sees it from someone who wants to travel or is on a trip, it indicates that he will not return home. Whoever sees that his eyes are the eyes of another person, this indicates that his sight has gone and that there is someone else guiding him on the way. Whoever sees that his eyes have fallen

If he sees that his eyes are made of iron, then he will tear his jacket and become very upset. And if he sees on his shoulder A man's eye or an animal's eye: he has unseen wealth, a black eye is a religion, a white eye is contrary to religion, and a blue eye is a heresy religion. The green eye is a religion that is contrary to other religions. And if he sees his eyes have disappeared, his children will die, and if he is oppressed, he will find someone holding his hand, and if someone who wants to travel or is on a trip sees it, then this indicates that. title: Interpretation of a dream about buying clothes: I dreamed of buying clothes in a dream

preview.html: An explanation of buying clothes for single, married, pregnant, and divorced women, whether they are new, children’s clothes, or underwear according to Ibn Sirin, and more. An explanation of buying clothes in a dream. Clothes are a symbol of urbanization. Every culture is characterized by an imprint of clothes, but the world today has become a small village in which every person aspires to buy different clothes from different people. Countries of the world as a kind of homogeneity and cultural openness. Or a person’s readiness for new clothes, which makes some people dream of buying clothes and ask about the meaning of these dreams. In this article, we will explain the meaning of seeing buying clothes in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about buying clothes varies between good and bad meanings, depending on the type of clothes and the difference in the dreamer’s status between married, single, and pregnant. Ibn Sirin's expression can be summarized by saying that if you see yourself buying new clothes or wearing them in a dream, this symbolizes a change in life for the better, but if you see yourself buying piles of clothes this indicates the death of a loved one. For you, if the clothes are dirty and old, it is a sign of failure and failure in something. If you see yourself buying new clothes from an individual store in a dream, this is a sign that she has an admirer among her colleagues or one of her relatives, but if the clothes you bought consist of a dress, pajamas, or A shirt, then this is a sign of engagement or marriage. If you dream of buying new clothes for a pregnant woman, it is interpreted according to the type of clothes that were purchased. For example, buying a dress indicates that the baby is female, but if she bought a coat, then the baby is male. God willing, a clothing store in a dream generally symbolizes the safety of the little child in his mother’s womb and at birth. If you see in a dream buying clothes for a married woman, this means that her husband will fall in love with her, with an increase in her beauty and goodness, and the woman acquiring a coat in a dream indicates an increase in livelihood or her journey. Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen believe that wearing clothes in general is a travel or Hajj, but buying worn clothes It is a burden, poverty, and a hated interpretation. Interpretation of seeing clothes in a dream When a person sees in a dream that he is buying a lot of new clothes, this vision may indicate that the dreamer will have a travel opportunity through which he will achieve many of the desires, goals, and aspirations that he wants to achieve, while seeing the arrangement. Of new clothes may indicate that his conditions have improved for the better and better. Interpretation of buying clothes in a dream by Ibn Sirin The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that if a person sees in his dream that he is buying a new dress, then this vision may indicate that the dreamer will obtain a new job opportunity through which he will achieve To the highest positions in his job. While seeing the purchase of old and dirty clothes, this vision may indicate the arrival of bad and sad news to the dreamer. And when one sees in a dream that he is giving someone a new dress, this vision may indicate that the dreamer will obtain a lot of goodness, livelihood, and money. Soon, but if he sees a dead person giving him some of his clothes, then this vision may...

If you see in a dream buying clothes for a married woman, this means that her husband will fall in love with her, with an increase in her beauty and goodness, and the woman acquiring a coat in a dream indicates an increase in livelihood or her journey. Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen believe that wearing clothes in general is a travel or Hajj, but buying worn clothes It is a burden, poverty, and a hated interpretation. Interpretation of seeing clothes in a dream When a person sees in a dream that he is buying a lot of new clothes, this vision may indicate that the dreamer will have a travel opportunity through which he will achieve many of the desires, goals, and aspirations that he wants to achieve, while seeing the arrangement. Of new clothes may indicate that his conditions have improved for the better and better. Interpretation of buying clothes in a dream by Ibn Sirin The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that if a person sees in his dream that he is buying a new dress, then this vision may indicate that the dreamer will obtain a new job opportunity through which he will achieve To the highest positions in his job. While seeing the purchase of old and dirty clothes, this vision may indicate the arrival of bad and sad news to the dreamer. And when one sees in a dream that he is giving someone a new dress, this vision may indicate that the dreamer will obtain a lot of goodness, livelihood, and money.
